section.title: Hardware and Software Support Matrix
section.para: This document lists the details about the supported hardware and software for [[[kw-hos-phrase]]]

Before performing any installation or upgrade of a [[[kw-hos]]] release on HPE (ProLiant) servers, the Service Pack for ProLiant (SPP) should be applied to be compatible with latest releases in firmware. The Service Pack for ProLiant (SPP) can be downloaded from
